scenario.name: Sailboat at KSFO (San Francisco)
scenario.description:
This scenario puts a sailboat in the bay just east of KSFO. The <rudder> tag works similarly to the <bank> tag for AI aircraft, except that the ship will turn but not bank (i.e. will not heel). Use small values for <rudder> for best effect.
Dave Culp, davidculp2 at comcast.net
